changeNote.changes: Fixed seeking/looping and leadsheets on Raspberry Pi 4. Reflashing is required.
Bugfix for MIDI files to be playable also on systems without a MIDI system.
The brand new Rocket Show Lighting Show Designer is now available. Compatibility with the new Raspberry Pi 4. Many further improvements and bugfixes.
Reflashing is recommended. Better stability for the access point. Enable more wifi options. Minor bugfixes.
Disable monitoring by default to avoid performance problems. Minor bugfixes.
Allow uploads up to 10 GB, show correct space left on device. Minor bugfixes.
Major update. Better sync, faster plays, many bugfixes.
Ability to seek through compositions, pause/resume, dark design, performance improvements and bugfixes
Added wireless access point feature, select specific compositions by MIDI control, minor enhancements and bugfixes
